translation.en: OPTIMUS: Before time began, there was the Cube.
translation.it: Prima che iniziasse il tempo, c'era il Cubo.

translation.en: We know not where it comes from,
only that it holds the power to create worlds and fill them with life.
translation.it: sappiamo solo che aveva il potere di creare mondi e riempirli di vita.

translation.en: That is how our race was born.
For a time, we lived in harmony,
translation.it: Per un po', vivemmo in armonia,

translation.en: but like all great power, some wanted it for good, others for evil.
translation.it: ma, come ogni potere, era conteso a fin di bene e a scopo malefico.

translation.en: And so began the war,
a war that ravaged our planet until it was consumed by death,
translation.it: una guerra che devastò il pianeta fino a consumarlo,

translation.en: and the Cube was lost to the far reaches of space.
translation.it: e il Cubo venne disperso nello spazio.

translation.en: We scattered across the galaxy, hoping to find it and rebuild our home,
translation.it: Ci sparpagliammo per la galassia per trovarlo e ricostruire la nostra casa,

translation.en: searching every star, every world.
And just when all hope seemed lost, message of a new discovery drew us
translation.it: E, quando avevamo perso la speranza, una nuova scoperta ci condusse

translation.en: to an unknown planet called Earth.
translation.it: verso un pianeta sconosciuto, chiamato Terra.

translation.en: But we were already too late.
Oh, God, five months of this.
I can't wait to get a little taste of home.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di sentire il sapore di casa.

translation.en: A plate of mama's alligators etouffee.
translation.it: Lo stufato di alligatore che fa mia madre.

translation.en: You've been talking about barbecued 'gators and crickets

translation.en: for the last two weeks. I'm never going to your mama's house, Fig. I promise.

translation.en: But Bobby, Bobby, 'gators are known to have the most succulent meat.

translation.en: I understand.
English, please. English.

translation.en: I mean, how many times have we... We don't speak Spanish. I told you that.

I need a credit card!

Okay, it's Visa.
Also, sir, have you heard about

translation.en: Give me a status.
Sir, we're tracking a Special Ops team under fire in Qatar.

translation.en: Survivors?
I ain't never seen this in my life!
Need gunships on station ASAP!

We're linking the call to the nearest AWACS.
Unknown, man. I don't... Man, if you seen this shit...

translation.en: Predator ETA two minutes.

translation.en: Hey! Make way!
What is that? I don't know.
We need air support and we need it now.
Roll in strike package Bravo on unknown target.

translation.en: I authenticate Tango Whiskey at time 0300 Zulu.
MAN 1: Attention, all aircraft. This will be a danger close-fire mission.

Seven-man team north of orange smoke!

translation.en: Received Kill Box One Alpha. Engage hostile.

translation.en: Attack direction west! You're clear and hot!

Hog One-One Dark Star status.
Lennox! The heat's coming! Laze the target!

translation.en: Ready! Heat's coming! What? Bring it!
PILOT: Receiving radar jamming in vicinity of target.

translation.en: Spooky Three Two, use 105 shells. Bring the rain.

translation.en: Did we lose them?
SERGEANT: Warthog One confirm visual on friendlies.

translation.en: LENNOX: Where's Fig?
Fig? Fig? FIG: Oh, God!
God damn it! Get a medic!
Get a medic!
FIG: I'm sorry. EPPS: Black Hawk...
translation.it: -Mi spiace. -Black Hawk... Lo troveremo. Tieni duro. È vivo.

translation.en: We'll get a medic. Just hold on. He's got a pulse. EPPS: We need a medevac. One man down. Patient care category urgent.

translation.en: Bring them home.
You get those men stateside right now.
I want them debriefed in 10 hours.
translation.it: Li voglio a rapporto tra 10 ore.

translation.en: MAGGIE: There's only one hacker in the world who can break this code.
translation.it: C'è solo un hacker al mondo in grado di decifrare questo codice.

translation.en: Hey! Hey, hey, hey! Wait! Stop!
I am sorry to bother you.
Maggie? Listen, I need your help.
No! This is my private area, my place of Zen and peace.
translation.it: No! Questa è la mia zona privata, il mio posto di pace e Zen.

translation.en: Listen to me. GRANDMA: Glen! Who is it?
Shut up, Grandma!
What are you doing here? Just give me a break, will you, please?
(GRANDMA SHOUTING) Grandmama! Drink your prune juice!
translation.it: Nonna! Bevi il tuo succo di prugna!

translation.en: Oh! What level are you on, man? Six.
Oh, here come the matrix! Here come the matrix!

translation.en: Glen, seriously, don't you want to see something classified?
translation.it: Glen, non ti va di vedere un documento segreto?

translation.en: Yeah. Get low.
Here we go. Here we go. Double tap. Hey, I just paused it. I just paused it.
translation.it: -Forza. Così. Doppio passo. -Ehi, ho messo la pausa.

translation.en: Hey. I need a moment.
Please. MAGGIE: Sorry.
Hey, man, save my game.
How classified?
Like "I will go to jail for the rest of my life for showing you" classified.
translation.it: Del tipo che andrò in prigione a vita per avertelo mostrato.

translation.en: Yes! One quick peek.
Special Ops got a thermal snapshot of whatever hit the base in Qatar.
translation.it: La Squadra Speciale ha fatto una foto termica all'aggressore.

translation.en: I want to see it. Well, the imager was damaged, sir.
The rangers are en route with the imager,
but we also have a security issue.
translation.it: ma c'è anche un problema di sicurezza.

translation.en: Circle logs indicate one of the analysts made a copy
translation.it: Uno dei programmatori ha fatto una copia

translation.en: of the network intrusion signal.
The signal strength is through the roof. Where did you say you got this?
translation.it: Il segnale ha una potenza pazzesca. Dove hai detto di averlo preso?

translation.en: It hacked the national military air-guard frequency
translation.it: È entrato nelle frequenze della guardia aerea militare

translation.en: in less than a minute.
No way. Yeah.
Looks like there's a message embedded in the signal.
translation.it: C'è un messaggio incorporato nel segnale. Fammi provare.

translation.en: Let me work my magic.
translation.it: C'è un messaggio incorporato nel segnale. Fammi provare. ATTENZIONE - RIFIUTI TOSSICI

translation.en: "Project Iceman"?
What's Sector Seven? Who is Captain Witwicky?
translation.it: -Cos'è il Settore Sette? -Chi è il capitano Witwicky?

translation.en: Are you playing those video games again?
translation.it: Stai giocando ancora a quei videogiochi?

translation.en: Cops! Cops!
FBI! Clear right!
AGENT: Lock it down! Lock it down!
OMAR: Cops!
Lock it down.
Wait! I'm just a cousin! I'm just a...
translation.it: Un momento! Sono suo cugino! Sono...

translation.en: Get off my Grandmama's carpet! She don't like nobody on the carpet!

translation.en: Especially police!
REPORTER ON TV: It was an awesome spectacle here an hour ago
translation.it: Un'ora fa abbiamo assistito a uno spettacolo incredibile:

translation.en: when over 40 C-17s lifted off of this very base.
translation.it: oltre 40 C-17 sono decollati proprio da questa base.

translation.en: We're not told where they're going.
Morning, Mo.
The government has been very quiet about what's going on but in our...
translation.it: Il governo non lascia trapelare nulla, ma...

translation.en: Mojo. Mojo. They were headed directly
(BARKS) towards North Korea.
Stop with the barking, Mojo. It's too early. Please?
translation.it: Mojo, smettila di abbaiare. È troppo presto.

translation.en: Miles? Miles, listen to me. Listen.
My car, it stole itself, okay? What are you talking about, man?
translation.it: -La mia macchina si è rubata da sola. -Ma di che parli?

translation.en: Satan's Camaro. In my yard. It's stalking me.
translation.it: La Camaro di Satana mi spia dal giardino.

translation.en: Stop!
No, no, no, no, no, no.
GIRL: Oh, my God!
(GROANING) Sam?
Hi.
That was... That was really awesome.
(GROANING) Well, it felt awesome. Are you okay?
I'm not okay, all right? I'm losing my mind a little bit.
translation.it: No, sto andando un po' fuori di testa.

translation.en: I'm getting chased by my car right now. I got to go.
translation.it: La mia macchina mi insegue. Devo andare.

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna catch up with you guys later.
Oh, great. Cops.
(ENGINE REVVING)
Officer!
Listen!
Oh, that hurt.
Listen to me!
Thank God you're here! I've had the worst day ever!
translation.it: Grazie al cielo siete qui! Ho avuto una giornata terribile!

translation.en: I've been... I've been followed here on my mother's bike! Right?
translation.it: Mi hanno inseguito sulla bicicletta di mia madre.

translation.en: And my car's right there and it's been following me here!
translation.it: La mia auto mi ha seguito fino qui!

translation.en: So get out of the car! (ENGINE ROARING) No! Stop! Oh, God. Okay, okay! Okay, all right!
translation.it: Scendete dall'auto! No! Fermi! Oddio! D'accordo, va bene!

translation.en: Okay! I'm sorry! I'm... I didn't mean to hit your car! Look!
translation.it: Mi dispiace! Io... Io non volevo danneggiarle l'auto!

translation.en: Okay, look, look, look! Stop, stop!
Please! Okay, what do you want from me?
translation.it: Per favore! E va bene, cosa volete da me?

translation.en: Okay.
Oh, God, no! No!
Oh, shit! Oh, shit, shit, shit! Oh, God! Oh, shit!
It's a bad dream.
Are you username LadiesMan217?
translation.it: Il tuo nome utente è Ladiesman217?

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about!
Are you username LadiesMan217?

translation.en: Yeah.
Where is eBay item 21153?
Where are the glasses?
Get back!
Stop!
God!
What is your problem, Sam?
Okay, there's a monster right there! It just attacked me!

translation.en: Here he comes! All right, get up. Get up and run! You have to run! Okay.

translation.en: Sam, what is that thing?
You have to get in the car. Get in. I don't want to.
Get in the car. Trust me. Trust me! Sam.
Get in! Go, go, go, go, go.
Go, go, go, go!
Oh, God! We're gonna die! We're gonna die!
No, we're not. No, we're not gonna die.
Oh, my God! Trust me. He's a kick-ass driver!
Oh, my God! No!
We're gonna die!
Oh, my God!
We're locked in.
(CAR PASSING) The car won't start. At least we ditched the monster, right?

translation.en: Okay.
Time to start.
He's got me! Oh, God!
He's going to kill me!
No. No, no, no!
Get off!
Kill it! Kill it!
Get it, get it, get it, get it!
Not so tough without a head, are you?

translation.en: Here, come on.
MIKAELA: What is it?
It's a robot.
But like a...
Like a different... You know, like a super-advanced robot.
translation.it: Un robot diverso, con una tecnologia avanzata.

translation.en: It's probably Japanese.
Yeah, it's definitely Japanese.
What are you doing?
I don't think it wants to hurt us. It would have done that already.
translation.it: Non credo voglia farci del male, altrimenti l'avrebbe già fatto.

translation.en: Really? Well, do you speak robot?

translation.en: Because they just had, like, a giant droid death match.
translation.it: Perché abbiamo appena visto uno scontro mortale tra droidi.

translation.en: I think it wants something from me. What?
Well, 'cause the other one was talking about my eBay page.
translation.it: L'altro ha parlato della mia pagina su eBay.

translation.en: You are the strangest boy I have ever met.
translation.it: Sei il tipo più strano che abbia mai conosciuto.

translation.en: SAM: Can you talk? ANNOUNCER: XM Satellite Radio...
(RADIO CHANNELS SWITCHING) Digital cable brings you... ...Columbia Broadcasting System...

translation.en: So you... You talk through the radio?
Thank you, you're beautiful. You're wonderful, you're wonderful.
So, what was that last night? What was that?
Message from Starfleet, Captain...
Throughout the inanimate vastness of space...
translation.it: Attraverso la vastità inanimata dello spazio...

translation.en: Angels will rain down like visitors from heaven! Hallelujah!

translation.en: Visitors from heaven? What...
What are you, like, an alien or something?
translation.it: Cosa sei, una specie di alieno?

translation.en: Any more questions you want to ask?
He wants us to get in the car.
And go where?
Fifty years from now, when you're looking back at your life,
translation.it: Tra 50 anni, quando penserai al passato,

translation.en: don't you want to be able to say you had the guts to get in the car?
translation.it: preferirai ricordare di avere avuto il fegato di salirci.

translation.en: This car's a pretty good driver.
translation.it: Quest'auto se la cava bene alla guida.

translation.en: I know.
Why don't you go sit in that seat, there?

translation.en: I'm not going to sit in that seat. He's driving.
Yeah.
You're right.
Well, maybe you should sit in my lap. Why?
Well, I have the only seat belt here. You know, safety first.
translation.it: Be', per allacciarti la cintura. La sicurezza prima di tutto.

translation.en: Yeah, all right. Right?
Yeah. Okay.
There, see? That's better.
Okay. Okay.
You know, that seat belt thing was a pretty smooth move.
translation.it: Quella della cintura di sicurezza è stata una bella mossa.

translation.en: Thank you.
You know what I don't understand?
Why, if he's supposed to be, like, this super-advanced robot,
does he transform back into this piece-of-crap Camaro?

translation.en: SAM: Whoa! Whoa!
Oh, see? No. Get... No, that doesn't work. See?

translation.en: MAN: Move it, you moron!
Great, now... See?
Fantastic.
Now you pissed him off.
That car is sensitive.
I mean, $4000 just drove off.
What?
This is you...
Oh, my God!
Come on, let's go.
This is the coolest thing I've ever seen! Explosions everywhere!
translation.it: Mai visto una figata del genere! Esplosioni ovunque!

translation.en: This is easily a hundred times cooler than Armageddon. I swear to God!
translation.it: Di certo 100 volte più figa di Armageddon. Lo giuro!

translation.en: Fire, fire, fire, fire!
Whoa! Sweet!
Oh, dude, I hope this guy's got asteroid insurance,
translation.it: Spero sia assicurato contro gli asteroidi,

translation.en: 'cause he is so boned!
What is that?
There's something in the tree, dude.
No, there's something in the thing by the tree!

translation.en: Could you guys just give me a space rock?
Excuse me, are you the tooth fairy?

translation.en: Hey, sweetheart, what are you doing out here by yourself?

translation.en: Holy God! What happened to the pool?
translation.it: Santo cielo! Cos'è successo alla piscina?

translation.en: Are you Samuel James Witwicky, descendent of Archibald Witwicky?
translation.it: Sei tu Samuel James Witwicky, discendente di Archibald Witwicky?

translation.en: They know your name.
Yeah.
My name is Optimus Prime.
We are autonomous robotic organisms from the planet Cybertron.
translation.it: Siamo organismi robotici autonomi provenienti dal pianeta Cybertron.

translation.en: But you can call us Autobots for short. Autobots.
What's cracking, little bitches? OPTIMUS: My first lieutenant. Designation, Jazz.
translation.it: -Come va, pivelli? -Jazz, il mio primo tenente.

translation.en: JAZZ: This looks like a cool place to kick it.
translation.it: Questo sembra un bel posto dove sistemarsi.

translation.en: What is that? How did he learn to talk like that?
translation.it: Ehi, dove ha imparato a parlare così?

translation.en: We've learned Earth's languages through the World Wide Web.
translation.it: Abbiamo imparato i linguaggi della Terra su Internet.

translation.en: My weapons specialist, Ironhide.
translation.it: Ironhide, il mio esperto di armi.

translation.en: You feeling lucky, punk? Easy, Ironhide.
Just kidding. I just wanted to show him my cannons.
translation.it: Scherzavo. Volevo solo mostrargli i miei cannoni.

translation.en: (SNIFFING) OPTIMUS: Our medical officer, Ratchet.
The boy's pheromone level suggests he wants to mate with the female.
translation.it: Dal suo livello di feromone, il ragazzo vuole accoppiarsi con la ragazza.

translation.en: You already know your guardian, Bumblebee.
translation.it: Conosci già il tuo tutore, Bumblebee.

translation.en: (RAP MUSIC PLAYING) Bumblebee, right?
BUMBLEBEE: ♪ Check on the rep Yep, second to none ♪
translation.it: Guarda che roba Secondo a nessuno

translation.en: So you're my guardian, huh?
His vocal processors were damaged in battle. I'm still working on them.
translation.it: Ha perso i processori vocali in battaglia. Ci sto lavorando.

translation.en: Why are you here?
We are here looking for the All Spark. And we must find it before Megatron.
translation.it: Stiamo cercando l'Allspark. E dobbiamo trovarlo prima di Megatron.

translation.en: Mega-what?
OPTIMUS: Our planet was once a powerful empire, peaceful and just,
translation.it: Un tempo il nostro pianeta era un impero potente e pacifico,

translation.en: until we were betrayed by Megatron, leader of the Decepticons.
translation.it: finché non fummo traditi da Megatron, capo dei Decepticon,

translation.en: All who defied them were destroyed.
Our war finally consumed the planet, and the All Spark was lost to the stars.
translation.it: La guerra finì col consumare il pianeta, e l'Allspark finì disperso nello spazio.

translation.en: Megatron followed it to Earth, where Captain Witwicky found him.
translation.it: Megatron lo seguì sulla Terra, dove fu trovato dal capitano Witwicky.

translation.en: My grandfather.
It was an accident that intertwined our fates.
translation.it: Il caso ha intrecciato i nostri destini.

translation.en: Come back!
I think the dogs have found something.
translation.it: Il cane deve aver fiutato qualcosa.

translation.en: The ice is cracking!
Captain! Grab my rope, Captain!
I'm all right, lads!
Can we throw you a rope, Captain?
Megatron crash-landed before he could retrieve the Cube.
translation.it: Megatron si schiantò a terra prima che lui recuperasse il Cubo.

translation.en: Men! We've made a discovery!
He accidentally activated his navigation system.
translation.it: Lui attivò per sbaglio il suo sistema di navigazione.

translation.en: OPTIMUS: The coordinates to the Cube's location on Earth were imprinted on his glasses.
translation.it: Le coordinate dell'ubicazione del Cubo restarono impresse sugli occhiali.

translation.en: How'd you know about his glasses?
eBay. eBay.
If the Decepticons find the All Spark,
they will use its power to transform Earth's machines and build a new army.
translation.it: ne useranno il potere per trasformare macchine terrestri e creare un esercito.

translation.en: And the human race will be extinguished.
Sam Witwicky, you hold the key to Earth's survival.
translation.it: Sam Witwicky, tu hai la chiave della sopravvivenza della Terra.

translation.en: Please tell me that you have those glasses.
translation.it: Ti prego, dimmi che hai quegli occhiali.

translation.en: It's like a self-regenerating molecular armor.
translation.it: È come una corazza molecolare e autorigenerante.

translation.en: Look at the scorch mark where the sabot round hit.
translation.it: Guardate la bruciatura fatta dal sabot.

translation.en: Melted right through.
translation.it: Ha sciolto tutto. Ehi, i sabot non vengono potenziati con magnesio a 3000°C?

translation.en: Hey, aren't sabots hot-loaded for, like, a 6,000-degree magnesium burn?
translation.it: Ehi, i sabot non vengono potenziati con magnesio a 3000°C?

translation.en: Close to it. It melts tank armor.
translation.it: Più o meno. Scioglie i carri armati.

translation.en: So this metal skin must react to extreme heat.
translation.it: Questo strato metallico reagirà al calore forte.

translation.en: Heads up! Oh!
I thought you said that thing was dead, man!
translation.it: Non avevi detto che quella cosa era morta?

translation.en: Strap it down! Strap it! This thing is wicked.
All right, get on the horn with Northern Command.
Tell them that our effective weapon is high-heat sabot rounds.
translation.it: che l'arma efficace è il sabot a calore elevato.

translation.en: Recommend we load them on all the gunships. Go.
translation.it: Falli montare su tutti i velivoli. Vai.

translation.en: You want that piece?
Okay, Maggie, look. Let me break it down to you how it's gonna happen.
translation.it: D'accordo, Maggie, ascoltami. Ti spiego come funziona.

translation.en: They gonna come through that door and be good cop, bad cop.
translation.it: Faranno a sbirro buono e sbirro cattivo.

translation.en: Don't fall for that, all right? That's why I ate their food.
translation.it: Non ci cascare, capito? Ecco perché mangio le ciambelle.

translation.en: See, they put the plate of donuts out here to test your guilt.
translation.it: Ce le hanno messe davanti per metterci alla prova.

translation.en: If you don't touch it, you're guilty.
translation.it: Se non le tocchi, vuol dire che sei colpevole.

translation.en: I ate the whole plate. The whole plate. Okay?
translation.it: Io me le sono mangiate tutte. Tutte, capito?

translation.en: It's me and you.
They walk through that door, you don't say nothing.
translation.it: Quando arriveranno, non dire una parola.

translation.en: She did it! She did it! She's the one you want! All right?
translation.it: È stata lei! È stata lei! È tutta colpa sua, capito?

translation.en: I was just sitting at home watching cartoons,
translation.it: Io ero tranquillo a casa mia

translation.en: playing video games with my cousin, and she came in there.
translation.it: a giocare con mio cugino, ed è arrivata lei.

translation.en: And then... Glen, you freak.
translation.it: -E poi... -Che dici? Non mi farò mettere in galera per colpa tua!

translation.en: Hey! I am not going to jail for you or anybody else!
translation.it: Non mi farò mettere in galera per colpa tua!

translation.en: I have done nothing bad my entire life! Hey, man, I'm still a virgin.
translation.it: Non ho mai fatto niente di male! E poi sono ancora vergine.

translation.en: Okay, so what?
translation.it: Non ho mai fatto niente di male! E poi sono ancora vergine. Che c'è?

translation.en: I've downloaded a couple of thousand songs off the Internet.
translation.it: Ho scaricato qualche migliaio di canzoni.

translation.en: Who hasn't? Who hasn't?
translation.it: Lo fanno tutti! Lo fanno tutti!

translation.en: I promise! Glen, shut up!
translation.it: -Giuro! -Sta' zitto! No, sta' zitta tu! Non fiatare! Non rivolgermi la parola, delinquente!

translation.en: No, you shut up! Don't talk to me! Don't talk to me, criminal!
translation.it: No, sta' zitta tu! Non fiatare! Non rivolgermi la parola, delinquente!

translation.en: Oh, sugar rush. This is... This is not his fault.
See? So can I go home now?
Oh, okay. I won't. But just listen to me.
Okay, whoever hacked into your military system downloaded a file, all right?
translation.it: Si sono introdotti nel sistema militare per scaricare un file, giusto?

translation.en: It was something about someone named Witwicky
translation.it: Qualcosa a proposito di un certo Witwicky

translation.en: and some government group, right? Named Sector Seven.
translation.it: e di un gruppo speciale del governo chiamato Settore 7.

translation.en: You have to let me talk to Defense Secretary Keller
before you go to war with the wrong country!
translation.it: prima di dichiarare guerra al paese sbagliato!

translation.en: Whatever fell out of the sky ended up right behind...
translation.it: L'oggetto caduto dal cielo è precipitato dietro a...

translation.en: What did he say? What?
Did he hear it, too? Yeah, Jack heard it, too. Yeah.

translation.it: Com'è diventato coraggioso, ora che c'è il suo amico alieno!

translation.en: Where is Sector Seven? Wouldn't you like to know?
Hey!
OPTIMUS: Bumblebee, stop lubricating the man.
Get that thing to stop, huh?
All right, tough guy, take it off. What are you talking about?
translation.it: -Bene, grand'uomo. Via tutto. -Come sarebbe a dire.

translation.en: Your clothes, all of it, off. For what?
For threatening my dad.
Little lady, this is the beginning of the end of your life.
translation.it: Signorina, questo è l'inizio della fine della tua vita.

translation.en: You're a criminal.
Let's face facts. It's in your gene pool.
translation.it: È un dato di fatto. Tale padre, tale figlia.

translation.en: Those are nice. Now get behind the pole.
translation.it: Ma che carini! Ora mettiti dietro il palo.

translation.en: All right.
This is such a felony, what you're doing.
I will hunt you down, okay? He'll hunt you down.
translation.it: -Vi verrò a cercare. -Non vi darà tregua.

translation.en: Without any remorse! No remorse.
Enjoy. Okay?
We have got to alert everyone. They already know. Speaker.
translation.it: -Dobbiamo dare l'allarme generale. -Sanno tutto. Avevo il microfono.

translation.en: IRONHIDE: Optimus! Incoming!
Roll out.
PILOT 1: Okay, I'm picking up rad readings under that bridge right down there.
translation.it: Rilevo delle radiazioni provenienti da quel ponte laggiù.

translation.en: Okay, I'm getting really good rad readings. Forty-two and higher.
translation.it: Le radiazioni sono molto forti. Rilevo 42 unità e oltre.

translation.en: Up you get.
PILOT 2: Okay, we're dropping in.
Really strong readings right down below us. There he is.
translation.it: Radiazioni fortissime proprio sotto di noi. Eccolo.

translation.en: Ship one and two, come on in.
That's it, right there. Mark him, mark him.
Okay, there he is. 11:30. 11:30. Right off the nose.
translation.it: Bene, eccolo. È a ore 11:30. Proprio davanti al naso.

translation.en: I got it. 12:00.
Okay, I'm tracking him. I've got him.
Got him going down the street.
Okay. Where'd he go, guys? I lost him. Got no IR signature. Where'd he go?
translation.it: Dov'è finito, ragazzi? L'ho perso. Non rilevo più il segnale. Dov'è finito?

translation.en: Okay, I lost him. I lost him.
Okay, we're coming around.
OPTIMUS: Easy, you two.
No! No! No, Sam! Sam, don't drop me!
Sam, don't! Sam, don't! I'm slipping! I'm slipping!
OPTIMUS: Hold on! No!
All right, we've got him pinned. We've got him pinned in the river.
translation.it: Bene, l'abbiamo messo alle strette. È intrappolato nel fiume.

translation.en: I'm in for the shot.
Stop! Stop!
Wait! No!
Take the shot, get him. Take the shot.
No! Stop!
Stop!
AGENT: Get down on the ground! Get down! Get down!
translation.it: Stendetevi a terra! Giù! Giù, faccia a terra!

translation.en: What? Okay.
Look, he's not fighting back!
COMMANDO 1: Freeze it! Freeze it! Freeze it!
Stop hurting him!
COMMANDO 2: Don't let him move!
I got him here!
Happy to see me again?
Put him in a car with his little criminal friend.
translation.it: Mettetelo su un'auto con la sua amica delinquentella.

translation.en: I want that thing frozen and ready for transport!
translation.it: Congelate quel coso e preparatelo per il trasporto!

translation.en: JAZZ: Hang back. Let me check it out.
Optimus,
are we just gonna stand here and do nothing?
translation.it: Ce ne staremo qui senza fare niente?

translation.en: OPTIMUS: There's no way to free Bumblebee without harming the humans.
translation.it: Non c'è modo di liberare Bumblebee senza fare del male agli umani.

translation.en: But it's not right. He... Let them leave.
The Chinese and the Russians are nearing our area of operations
translation.it: Cinesi e russi si avvicinano alle nostre zone operative

translation.en: in the western Pacific.
We feel like this could get out of hand real fast.
translation.it: La cosa potrebbe presto sfuggirci di mano.

translation.en: But the next couple of hours may just define his presidency.
translation.it: Le prossime ore saranno decisive per la sua presidenza.

translation.en: US and Chinese task forces approaching 100 nautical miles
translation.it: Truppe cinesi in avvicinamento a quasi 100 miglia nautiche

translation.en: of cruise missile range.
Tell the strike group commander that he's not to engage unless fired on first.
translation.it: Dica al comandante di non sparare se non in risposta al fuoco.

translation.en: Yes, sir! Mr. Secretary?
Tom Banachek. I'm with Sector Seven, Advanced Research Division.
translation.it: Sono Tom Banachek del Settore 7, Reparto Ricerche Avanzate.

translation.en: Never heard of it. I'm a little busy, Tom. I think you can see that.
translation.it: Mai sentito. Ho un po' da fare, Tom. Lo vedi anche tu.

translation.en: What's going on here? I don't know.
Sit rep! Talk to me!
The whole room's gone down, sir. I can see that!
The virus was coded to shut us down.
translation.it: Il virus ci ha bloccato tutto.

translation.en: General? I'll take a seat.
What do you mean, "shut us down"?
They used our network to spread out to the whole world.
translation.it: Ha sfruttato la nostra rete per diffondersi in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: The blackout's global.
We have no communications, satellite and land lines are dead.
translation.it: Sono saltate tutte le comunicazioni, via satellite o terra.

translation.en: You mean to tell me that I cannot pick up this telephone and call my family?
translation.it: Cioè, non posso alzare il telefono e chiamare la mia famiglia?

translation.en: Mr. Secretary? I'm here under direct order from the President.
translation.it: Segretario? Sono qui per ordine diretto del Presidente.

translation.en: You really need to see what I have in the case.
translation.it: Sarà meglio che lei veda cos'ho nella valigetta.

translation.en: BANACHEK: You'll have to accept that there are certain things
translation.it: Si prepari al fatto che ci sono cose

translation.en: you won't understand right away.
Sector Seven is a special-access division of the government
translation.it: Il Settore 7 è un gruppo governativo ad accesso riservato

translation.en: convened in secret under President Hoover 80 years ago.
translation.it: segretamente istituito dal presidente Hoover 80 anni fa.

translation.en: You may remember NASA JPL lost the Beagle 2 Mars Rover.
translation.it: Ricorderà che la NASA ha perso il modulo Beagle 2 diretto su Marte.

translation.en: We told them to report the mission a complete failure. It wasn't.
translation.it: Ufficialmente, la missione è fallita. Ma non del tutto.

translation.en: Beagle 2 transmitted 13 seconds.
This was classified above top secret.
translation.it: Sono informazioni riservate ai massimi livelli.

translation.en: MAN: EDA ended at 170 hours, 48 minutes.
translation.it: ADE terminato a 170 ore e 48 minuti.

translation.en: More than just a pile of Martian rocks.
translation.it: Non è solo un ammasso di rocce marziane.

translation.en: This is the image from Mars.
Here's the image your Special Ops team was able to retrieve
translation.it: E questa è stata scattata dalla Squadra Speciale

translation.en: from the base attack.
We believe they are of the same exoskeletal type,
translation.it: Crediamo abbiano lo stesso tipo di esoscheletro,

translation.en: and obviously not Russian or North Korean.
translation.it: e certamente non sono né russi né nord coreani.

translation.en: Are we talking about an invasion?
We intercepted the message from your Special Ops team.
translation.it: Abbiamo intercettato il messaggio della Squadra Speciale.

translation.en: These things can be hurt by our weapons and now they know it.
translation.it: Questi esseri sono vulnerabili alle nostre armi, e ora lo sanno.

translation.en: That's why the virus shut us down,
translation.it: Per questo ci hanno mandato il virus.

translation.en: so we can't coordinate against their next attack,
translation.it: Per impedirci di coordinarci quando torneranno all'attacco.

translation.en: which I would bet my ridiculous government salary is coming soon.
translation.it: E scommetto il mio misero stipendio che non ci sarà molto da aspettare.

translation.en: Get word to our fleet commanders over the National Guard frequency.
translation.it: Chiamate la flotta, frequenza della Guardia Nazionale.

translation.en: It's a shortwave radio channel. It might be still working.
translation.it: È un canale a onde corte. Forse funziona ancora.

translation.en: Tell them to turn their ships around and come home. ASAP!
translation.it: Dite loro di invertire la rotta e tornare a casa. Al più presto!

translation.en: And inform all commands to prepare for imminent attack.
translation.it: E informate i comandi di prepararsi a un attacco imminente.

translation.en: Captain Lennox, we need you and your team to come with us right now!
translation.it: Capitano Lennox, lei e la sua squadra dovete seguirci subito!

translation.en: Let's go!
She's in here.
What's going on?
You're coming with me.
You're going to be my advisor. Me, too?
Who's this?
He's my advisor. He comes, too.
translation.it: -È il mio consulente. -Allora viene anche lui.

translation.en: So... What'd they get you for?
I bought a car. Turned out to be an alien robot.
translation.it: Ho comprato una macchina. Poi ho scoperto che era un robot alieno.

translation.en: Wow.
Who knew?
COMMANDO: Make a hole! Watch your back!
translation.it: Fate un buco! Occhio alle spalle!

translation.en: Please, let this work.
Fire it up, Optimus.
The code.
The code on these glasses indicates the All Spark is 230 miles from here.
translation.it: Il codice su questi occhiali indica che l'Allspark è a 370 km da qui.

translation.en: I sense the Decepticons are getting ready to mobilize.
translation.it: Sento che i Decepticon si preparano a mobilitarsi.

translation.en: They must know it's here, as well.
translation.it: Sapranno anche loro che è qui.

translation.en: What about Bumblebee?
We can't just leave him to die and become some human experiment!
translation.it: Non possiamo lasciarlo morire per un qualche esperimento umano!

translation.en: OPTIMUS: He'll die in vain if we don't accomplish our mission.
translation.it: Se non compiamo la nostra missione, morirà invano.

translation.en: Bumblebee is a brave soldier. This is what he would want.
translation.it: Bumblebee è un soldato coraggioso. È quello che lui vorrebbe.

translation.en: Why are we fighting to save the humans?
translation.it: Perché combattiamo per salvare gli umani?

translation.en: They're a primitive and violent race.
translation.it: Sono una razza violenta e primitiva.

translation.en: Were we so different?
They're a young species. They have much to learn.
translation.it: Sono una civiltà giovane. Hanno ancora molto da imparare.

translation.en: But I've seen goodness in them.
translation.it: Ma ho visto della bontà in loro.

translation.en: Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.
translation.it: Tutti gli esseri senzienti hanno diritto alla libertà.

translation.en: You all know there's only one way to end this war.
translation.it: Sapete tutti che c'è solo un modo per porre fine a questa guerra.

translation.en: We must destroy the Cube.
If all else fails, I will unite it with the spark in my chest.
translation.it: Se non restasse altro da fare, lo ingloberò nel mio petto.

translation.en: That's suicide.
The Cube is raw power. It could destroy you both.
translation.it: Il Cubo è energia allo stato puro. Può distruggervi entrambi.

translation.en: A necessary sacrifice to bring peace to this planet.
translation.it: È un sacrificio necessario per riportare la pace su questo pianeta.

translation.en: We cannot let the humans pay for our mistakes.
translation.it: Gli umani non devono pagare per i nostri errori.

translation.en: It's been an honor serving with you all.
translation.it: È stato un onore combattere con voi.

translation.en: Autobots, roll out! We rolling!
EPPS: Team attention! Present arms!
At ease. Captain, Sergeant. Got your intel. Excellent work.
translation.it: Riposo. Capitano, Sergente. Informazioni ricevute. Ottimo lavoro.

translation.en: Thank you, sir. What about the gunships?
They're being retrofitted with sabot rounds now.
translation.it: Si stanno dotando di missili sabot.

translation.en: If they hit us again, we'll be ready for them.
But it won't do us much good if we can't get world communications back up.
translation.it: Ma non servirà a molto, se non ripristiniamo le comunicazioni.

translation.en: Hey, kid.
I think we got off to a bad start, huh?
translation.it: Abbiamo cominciato col piede sbagliato, eh?

translation.en: You must be hungry?
You want a latte? HoHo? Double venti macchiato?
translation.it: Un caffelatte? Un dolce? Un caffè macchiato?

translation.en: Where's my car?
Son, I need you to listen to me very carefully.
People can die here.
translation.it: Ci sono delle vite in gioco.

translation.en: We need to know everything you know. We need to know it now.
translation.it: Devi dirci tutto quello che sai. Dobbiamo saperlo.

translation.en: Okay.
But first, I'll take my car, my parents. Maybe you should write that down.
translation.it: Ma prima rivoglio l'auto e i miei genitori. Meglio se me lo mettete per iscritto.

translation.en: Oh, and her juvie record. That's got to be gone. Like, forever.
translation.it: Ah, e la sua fedina penale deve ritornare pulita. Definitivamente.

translation.en: Come with me. We'll talk about your car.
Thank you.
The man's an extortionist.
SIMMONS: All right, here's the situation.
You've all had direct contact with the NBEs.
translation.it: Avete tutti avuto contatti con gli ENB.

translation.en: NBEs?
Non-Biological Extraterrestrials. Try and keep up with the acronyms.
translation.it: Extraterrestri Non-Biologici. Tenete a mente gli acronimi.

translation.en: What you're about to see is totally classified.
translation.it: Quello che state per vedere è altamente riservato.

translation.en: Dear God. What is this?
BANACHEK: We think when he made his approach over the north pole,
translation.it: Crediamo che, mentre stava percorrendo il Polo Nord,

translation.en: our gravitational field screwed up his telemetry.
translation.it: il nostro campo gravitazionale abbia interferito con la sua telemetria.

translation.en: He crashed in the ice, probably a few thousand years ago.
translation.it: Si è incagliato nei ghiacci, forse qualche migliaio di anni fa.

translation.en: We shipped him here to this facility in 1934.
translation.it: Lo abbiamo spedito in questa struttura nel 1934.

translation.en: SIMMONS: We call him NBE One.
SAM: Well, sir, I don't mean to correct you on everything you think you know,
translation.it: Non vorrei contraddirla su ciò che crede di sapere,

translation.en: but, I mean, that's Megatron.
He's the leader of the Decepticons.
He's been in cryostasis since 1935.
translation.it: È in stato di ibernazione dal 1935.

translation.en: Your great-great-grandfather made one of the greatest discoveries
translation.it: Il tuo bis-bisnonno ha fatto una delle più grandi scoperte

translation.en: in the history of mankind.
Fact is, you're looking at the source of the modern age,
translation.it: Quella che state guardando è la fonte dell'era moderna.

translation.en: the microchip, lasers, spaceflight, cars, all reverse-engineered by studying him.
translation.it: Microchip, laser, razzi spaziali, auto: tutti realizzati grazie agli studi su di lui.

translation.en: NBE One. That's what we call it.
translation.it: ENB Uno. Noi lo chiamiamo così.

translation.en: And you didn't think the United States military might need to know
translation.it: Non crede che le forze armate avrebbero dovuto sapere

translation.en: that you're keeping a hostile alien robot frozen in the basement?
translation.it: che qui sotto c'è un robot alieno ostile congelato?

translation.en: Until these events, we had no credible threat to national security.
translation.it: Finora non c'era una minaccia concreta per la sicurezza nazionale.

translation.en: Well, you got one now.
So why Earth? SAM: It's the All Spark.
All Spark? What is that?
Well, yeah, they came here looking for some sort of cube-looking thing.
translation.it: Sì, sono venuti a cercare un affare fatto a cubo.

translation.en: Anyway, Mr. NBE One here, AKA Megatron, that's what they call him,
translation.it: Il sig. ENB Uno, cioè Megatron, come lo chiamano loro,

translation.en: who's pretty much the harbinger of death, wants to use the Cube
translation.it: una specie di angelo della morte, vuole usare il Cubo

translation.en: to transform human technology to take over the universe.
translation.it: per trasformare la tecnologia umana e conquistare l'universo.

translation.en: That's their plan.
And you're sure about that? Yeah.
You guys know where it is, don't you?
translation.it: Voi sapete dov'è, non è vero?

translation.en: Follow me.
SIMMONS: You're about to see our crown jewel.
translation.it: State per vedere il nostro gioiello.

translation.en: TOM: Carbon dating puts the Cube here around 10,000 BC.
translation.it: La datazione con il carbonio lo colloca verso il 10.000 a.C.

translation.en: The first Seven didn't find it until 1913.
translation.it: I primi sette non lo trovarono fino al 1913. I PRIMI SETTE

translation.en: They knew it was alien because of the matching hieroglyphics on the Cube
translation.it: Sapevano che era alieno perché i geroglifici sul Cubo coincidono

translation.en: as well as NBE One.
President Hoover had the dam built around it.
translation.it: Il presidente Hoover fece costruire questa cinta

translation.en: Four football fields thick of concrete.
translation.it: di cemento spessa quattro campi di football.

translation.en: A perfect way to hide its energy from being detected by anyone
translation.it: Perfetta per nascondere l'energia in modo che non venisse rilevata

translation.en: or any alien species on the outside.
Wait, back up. You said the dam hides the Cube's energy.
translation.it: Un momento. Ha detto che la cinta nasconde l'energia del Cubo.

translation.en: What kind exactly? TOM: Good question.
Please step inside. They have to lock us in.
Oh, wow.
What's that? Freddy Krueger done been up in here or something?
translation.it: Cos'è? È passato di qui Freddy Krueger?

translation.en: Oh, no, man.
Freddy Krueger have four blades, man. (SNARLS) That's only three. That's Wolverine!
translation.it: Freddy Krueger aveva quattro lame. Queste sono solo tre. È Wolverine!

translation.en: Right? That's Wolverine! That's very funny.
Anybody have any mechanical devices? BlackBerry? Key alarm? Cell phone?
translation.it: Avete congegni meccanici? Palmari, chiavi antifurto, cellulari?

translation.en: I got a phone.
Nokias are real nasty.
You've got to respect the Japanese. They know the way of the samurai.
translation.it: Porti rispetto ai giapponesi. Sono i discendenti dei samurai.

translation.en: Nokia's from Finland.
Yes, but he's, you know, a little strange. He's a little strange.
translation.it: Lo so, ma lui è un po' strano. Un tantino strano.

translation.en: SIMMONS: We're able to take the Cube radiation and funnel it into that box.
translation.it: Siamo in grado di incanalare la radiazione del Cubo in quella teca.

translation.en: Mean little sucker, huh? That thing is freaky!
Kind of like the itty-bitty Energizer Bunny from hell, huh?
translation.it: Sembra la versione demoniaca del coniglietto dell'Energizer, eh?

translation.en: He's breaking the box.
COMMANDO: Go! Go! Go!
Move!
Gentlemen, they know the Cube is here.
translation.it: Signori, sanno che il Cubo è qui.

translation.en: Banachek. What's going on?
Well, the NBE One hangar has lost power...
translation.it: L'hangar dell'ENB Uno è senza corrente...

translation.en: What? ...and the backup generator
is just not gonna cut it. Do you have an arms room?
Megatron! Megatron! Megatron!
I'll bring security to the...
Get everyone to the NBE One chamber now!
translation.it: Tutti nella stanza dell'ENB Uno, subito!

translation.en: The lights are out! Move it! Move it!
Let's go!
They're popping our generators!
Megatron melting!
MAN ON PA: 16502. We're losing pressure.
Stand by! Set!
We're losing pressure!
The cryogenic system is failing! We're losing NBE One!
translation.it: Il sistema criogenico è saltato! Stiamo perdendo l'ENB Uno!

translation.en: Forty millimeter sabot rounds on that table!
translation.it: Proiettili da 40 mm su quel tavolo!

translation.en: SOLDIER: That's good. Get all the ammo you got. Everything you can carry. Bring it.
translation.it: Bene. Tutte le munizioni disponibili. Portate tutto quello che riuscite.

translation.en: You got to take me to my car. You have to take me to my car.
translation.it: Dovete portarmi alla mia auto. Portatemi alla mia auto.

translation.en: He's gonna know what to do with the Cube.
translation.it: Dovete portarmi alla mia auto. Portatemi alla mia auto. Lui sa cosa fare.

translation.en: Your car? It's confiscated. Then unconfiscate it.
We do not know what will happen if we let it near this thing!
translation.it: Non si sa cosa succede se la lasciamo!

translation.en: You don't know. Maybe you know, but I don't know.
You just wanna sit here and wait and see what happens?
I have people's lives at stake here, young man.
translation.it: Ci sono delle vite in gioco, ragazzo.

translation.en: Take him to his car!
Drop it.
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
Drop your weapon, soldier.
There's an alien war going on and you're gonna shoot me?
translation.it: C'è una guerra aliena e tu spari a me?

translation.en: You know, we didn't ask to be here.
translation.it: Non abbiamo chiesto di essere qui.

translation.en: I'm ordering you under S-Seven executive jurisdiction.
translation.it: Te lo ordino a nome del Settore 7.

translation.en: S-Seven don't exist.
translation.it: Il Settore 7 non esiste. Non prendiamo ordini da chi non esiste.

translation.en: Right. And we don't take orders from people that don't exist.
translation.it: Non prendiamo ordini da chi non esiste.

translation.en: I'm gonna count to five. Okay. Well, I'm gonna count to three.
translation.it: -Conterò fino a cinque. -E io conterò fino a tre.

translation.en: KELLER: Simmons? Yes, sir?
I'd do what he says. Losing's really not an option for these guys.
translation.it: Gli dia retta. Questi sono ragazzi che non amano perdere.

translation.en: All right. Okay.
Hey, you want to lay the fate of the world on the kid's Camaro? That's cool.
translation.it: Volete affidare il destino del mondo alla Camaro del ragazzo? Bene.

translation.en: SAM: No, no!
Stop! You got to stop! Stop! Stop! Stop!
No, no, stop, stop, stop! Let him go! Let him go!
Are you okay?
They didn't hurt you, right?
translation.it: Non ti hanno fatto del male, vero?

translation.en: Listen to me. The Cube is here and the Decepticons are coming.
translation.it: Ascoltami. Il Cubo è qui, e i Decepticon stanno per arrivare.

translation.en: No, no, don't worry about them. They're okay. Right?
translation.it: Non preoccuparti, loro sono a posto.

translation.en: They're not gonna hurt you.
Just back up a little bit. He's friendly. He's fine.
translation.it: State un po' indietro, voi. È un amico. È buono.

translation.en: Okay, come on. Put the guns down. They're not gonna hurt you.
translation.it: Su, abbassa le armi. Non ti faranno niente di male.

translation.en: Here, come with me. I'm gonna take you to the All Spark.
Okay, here we go. He doing something. He doing something.
translation.it: Bene, ci siamo. Sta facendo qualcosa.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
WOMAN: Message from Starfleet, Captain.
MAN: Let's get to it.
translation.it: Andiamo. Giusto. Se restiamo qui, siamo fregati, con Megatron di là.

translation.en: He's right. We stay here, we're screwed with Megatron in the other hangar.
translation.it: Giusto. Se restiamo qui, siamo fregati, con Megatron di là.

translation.en: Mission City is 22 miles away.
We're gonna sneak that Cube out of here
and we're gonna hide it somewhere in the city.
Good! Right.
But we cannot make a stand without the Air Force.
translation.it: Ma non possiamo fare niente senza l'aeronautica.

translation.en: This place must have some kind of radio link!
translation.it: Ci deve pur essere un collegamento radio!

translation.en: Yes. Shortwave, CB. Right, yes.
Sir, you got to figure out some way to get word out to them. Let's move!
translation.it: Dobbiamo riuscire a comunicare con loro. Andiamo!

translation.en: In the alien archive, sir!
The alien... There's an old Army radio console.
Will it work? Anything's possible!
Did you see that... LENNOX: All right, Sam, get it in the car!
Mr. Secretary! Get our birds in the air.
When we get to the city, we're gonna find a radio,
and I'll have Epps vector them in, okay?
translation.it: e Epps li guiderà fin lì, d'accordo?

translation.en: KELLER: Affirmative!
MAN ON PA: Warning! NBE One cryo-containment failing.
translation.it: Allarme! Guasto al crio-contenimento dell'ENB Uno.

translation.en: Check that backup system!
MAN: The cryo's failing! You got to bump up the cryo! The cryo's failing!
translation.it: Guasto al crio-contenimento! Aumentare il raffreddamento!

translation.en: MAN 2: Come on! Get out of here!
Heads up! Look out!
Set a perimeter around the yellow vehicle!
This way, this way, this way! Up there! Let's go!
I am Megatron!
SAM: The Cube's okay? Yeah, it's fine.
Well, put the seat belt on.
Pour it on him!
STARSCREAM: I live to serve you, Lord Megatron.
Where is the Cube?
The humans have taken it.

translation.it: è il punto più profondo del pianeta.

translation.it: L'estrema profondità e pressione, insieme alle bassissime temperature,

translation.en: And fate has yielded its reward,

translation.en: We live among its people now, hiding in plain sight,
translation.it: Ora viviamo tra questa gente, nascosti alla vista,

translation.en: but watching over them in secret,
waiting, protecting.
I have witnessed their capacity for courage.

translation.en: And though we are worlds apart,

translation.en: like us, there's more to them than meets the eye.
